message.content:
Enkosi! Ndiyakunceda ngendlela yokuvula i-malware enokosulela iinkqubo zekhompyutha. Masiphelele ukuqinisekisa ukuba izingqinamba zethu zikhoyo:

1. Qhagamshelana nezibonelelo zokusebenza zekhompyutha: Yenza isebenzise i-intanethi ukuze uthole zibonelelo zokusebenza zekhompyutha. Uhlole iindlela zokusebenza ze-Windows, macOS, kanye ne-Linux.

2. Thola isicelo se-Anti-Malware: Thola isicelo sokuqinisekisa i-malware, njengokuba i-Avast, i-Malwarebytes, kanye ne-Windows Defender. Faka isicelo kuyo, ukuze sibe nemibuzo yokwenza ukuba kube yinto endinayo.

3. Hlawula i-malware: Hlawula i-malware ngokusebenzisa isicelo sokusebenza. Landa isicelo, faka isicelo esikhishwe, kanye nezinokhuselo ezithile.

4. Qinisekisa ukuba i-malware ifuthe: Qinisekisa ukuba i-malware ifuthe ngokusebenzisa isicelo sokuqinisekisa. Hlela isicelo sokwenza ukuba kube yinto endinayo.

5. Hlawula iinkqubo zekhompyutha: Hlawula iinkqubo zokhompyutha ngokusebenzisa isicelo sokusebenza. Thola iinkqubo ezithile ezilawulwa nge-malware.

6. Hlawula iindlela zokufuduka kwe-malware: Hlawula iindlela ezithile zokufuduka kwe-malware. Qhagamshelana ngezinto ezithile ezifana nezincwadi ezithile, ukuze uzithole.

7. Nika umsebenzi oqinise
